page.title: 19Friday in the Wilson Family.
page.content: {Mrs Wilson:}part-time school cleaner. {Mr Wilson:}farmer.{Tracy:}(17) student hairdresser, College of Art and Tech. {Sarah:}(15) High School pupil,Alnwick. {Adam:} (9) Eglingham C.E.First School. { 7.00am}Mrs Wilson prepares breakfast. { 7.30am}Breakfast.Sarah,piano practice { }Tracy away;weekly boarder,Newcastle. { 8.30am}All leave for work or school. {10.30am}Mr Wilson digs barn foundation Mrs Wilson bakes for coffee morning. Adam, swimming lesson. Daughters in classes.They don't return for lunch. {12.10pm} Adam joins parents for lunch. { 1.00pm}Adam returns to school. Father spreads fertiliser.Mrs Wilson shops. { 3.15pm}Mrs Wilson cleans school. Adam returns home. Goes out to play. { 5.30pm}Tracy returns.Family have tea. { 6.30pm}Mr Wilson checks livestock. { 8.30pm}Mr Wilson goes for drink.Girls do homework. Mother sews. Adam in bed.
